2d34c2eaf534725b03af27e1bbad6da0.response:
EVALUATE
TOPN(
    5,
    FILTER(
        ADDCOLUMNS(
            SUMMARIZE(
                'FIS_CL_DETAIL_FACT',
                'FIS_CL_DETAIL_FACT'[CUSTOMER_KEY]
            ),
            "CustomerName", LOOKUPVALUE(
                'FIS_CUSTOMER_DIMENSION'[CUSTOMER_NAME],
                'FIS_CUSTOMER_DIMENSION'[CUSTOMER_KEY],
                'FIS_CL_DETAIL_FACT'[CUSTOMER_KEY]
            ),
            "OutstandingLoans", CALCULATE(
                SUM('FIS_CL_DETAIL_FACT'[PRINCIPAL_BALANCE])
            )
        ),
        [OutstandingLoans] >= 1000000
    ),
    [OutstandingLoans], DESC
)
